Title: Relates to the use of paid sick leave for bereavement purposes
Summary: Allows an employee to use paid sick leave for bereavement upon the death of a family member, or upon a miscarriage or still birth by the employee or the employee's spouse or domestic partner or upon a foster child leaving a foster family provided the foster child was in the care of the foster family for six months or longer.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to the use of paid sick leave for bereavement purposes
